mapper.select: SELECT TRIM(CODE) CODE, TRIM(CODE_NM) CODE_NM FROM C_COMM_CD WHERE CD_GRP = 'PLANT_CD' ORDER BY CODE
SELECT TRIM(CODE) CODE, TRIM(CODE_NM) CODE_NM FROM C_COMM_CD WHERE CD_GRP = 'CARTYPE' ORDER BY CODE
SELECT TRIM(CODE) CODE, TRIM(CODE_NM) CODE_NM FROM C_COMM_CD WHERE CD_GRP = 'LINE_CD' ORDER BY CODE
SELECT TRIM(CODE) CODE, TRIM(CODE_NM) CODE_NM FROM C_COMM_CD WHERE CD_GRP = 'STN_TYPE' ORDER BY CODE
SELECT TRIM(CODE) CODE, TRIM(CODE_NM) CODE_NM FROM C_COMM_CD WHERE CD_GRP = 'SHIFT' ORDER BY CODE

SELECT DEVICE_GRP_CD DEVICE_GRP_CD, DEVICE_GRP_CD DEVICE_GRP_NM FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(DEVICE_GRP_CD) DEVICE_GRP_CD FROM TIGHTENING_DEVICE_MA WHERE trim(PLANT_CD) = #{plant_cd} ) ORDER BY DEVICE_GRP_CD

SELECT RTRIM(M.DEVICE_ID) || '-' || RTRIM(M.DEVICE_SERIAL) AS DEVICE_ID, '['|| RTRIM(M.DEVICE_ID) || '-' || RTRIM(M.DEVICE_SERIAL) || '] ' || RTRIM(M.DEVICE_NM) || '-' || RTRIM(M.DEVICE_ALIAS) AS DEVICE_NM FROM TIGHTENING_DEVICE_MA M INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT A.PLANT_CD, A.DEVICE_ID, A.DEVICE_SERIAL FROM DEVICE_JOBNO_MA A WHERE TRIM(A.PLANT_CD) = #{plant_cd} AND (#{car_type} = '-1' OR A.CAR_TYPE_GRP = #{car_type}) ) A ON A.PLANT_CD = M.PLANT_CD AND A.DEVICE_ID = M.DEVICE_ID AND A.DEVICE_SERIAL = M.DEVICE_SERIAL LEFT OUTER JOIN C_COMM_CD B ON B.PLANT_CD = M.PLANT_CD AND B.CD_GRP = 'LINE_CD' AND B.CODE = M.LINE_CD WHERE TRIM(M.PLANT_CD) = #{plant_cd} ORDER BY B.CODE_VALUE, M.DEVICE_NM, M.DEVICE_SERIAL
SELECT TRIM(CODE) CODE, TRIM(CODE_NM) CODE_NM FROM C_COMM_CD WHERE CD_GRP = 'DEVICE_TYPE' ORDER BY CODE
SELECT TRIM(CODE) CODE, TRIM(CODE_NM) CODE_NM FROM C_COMM_CD WHERE CD_GRP = 'DEVICE_STATE' ORDER BY CODE
